adventure2D.project

Class Boss

  • java.lang.Object
    • adventure2D.project.GObject
      • adventure2D.project.Character
        • adventure2D.project.Boss

  • public class Boss
extends Character
    A class representing the boss of a stage. As for now there is only one stage in the game (if the game would be to be expanded it would be different) it is directly the game's boss.

    • Field Detail

      • Health

        int Health
        The boss' health. Attacking decreases it and if <= 0, it is assumed to be defeated.
